short_description: hand global solutions is a tech company based in singapore.
long_description:
hand global solutions, a pioneering company in enterprise digital transformation since 1996, offers a powerful saas platform to diverse industries across 89 countries. headquartered in singapore, we have expanded our local teams in southeast asia to enhance client support. committed to stable and agile digital transformation, hand invites you to experience the transformative potential of their platform. with a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, hand empowers organizations to optimize processes, increase efficiency, and drive revenue growth. our services include expert erp solutions in sap, oracle, net
suite, application management, and cloud migration. additionally, hand provides a suite of cutting-edge solutions, including smart factory (mes), cross-border e-commerce (oms), robotic process automation (rpa), iot solution & platform (hi-iot), service management (yan cloud), expense management (helios), and supplier relationship management (srm). by leveraging these solutions, businesses can enhance operational excellence, achieve growth, and thrive in today's competitive landscape.

long_description:
hand global is part of hand enterprise solutions which was founded in 1996 in shanghai, china, and is listed on shenzhen stock exchange since 2011 (stock code: 300170). with 13000+ employees, 6000+ customers globally and 31.000+ projects to date, we are proud to state that we are the biggest it solution provider in china and we are the most international one. 
 since 2007, hand has set up subsidiaries outside china in japan, singapore, the united states, india, and the netherlands. the goal for these subsidiaries is to greatly improve customer intimacy and provide local management and consultancy in the same country, time zone and preferably language.
